Body:
input_1 = bw.wire.Wire()
switch = bw.wire.Wire()
output = bw.wire.Wire()
a = bw.wire.TristateBuffer(switch, input_1, output)
switch.value = 0
input_1.value = 0
assert output.value == 0
input_1.value = 1
assert output.value == 0
switch.value = 1
assert output.value == 1
input_1.value = 0
assert output.value == 0
input_1.value = 1
assert output.value == 1
switch.value = 0
assert output.value == 1
input_1.value = 0
assert output.value == 1
input_1.value = 1
output.value = 0
assert input_1.value == 1
print(a.__doc__)
print(a)
a(enable=1, input=0, output=None)
assert output.value == 0
